name: Fallen Planetar
description: The Fallen Planetar is a large celestial with exceptional combat prowess, characterized by its flaming sword and majestic angelic form.
memorable: It can automatically detect lies and cannot tell falsehoods, showcasing its honest nature.
goals: To protect allies and fight against threats with its formidable combat and spellcasting abilities.
relations: May be related to other celestial beings or serve a higher celestial authority.
environment: Typically found in celestial realms, but may venture to the material plane for significant causes.
strengths: High armor class and hit points make it durable, along with versatile attack options.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and can be exploited due to this weakness.
attacks: Uses a flaming sword for melee attacks dealing significant slashing and fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Champion of Truth allows the Fallen Planetar to detect lies automatically and prohibits it from lying.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 60 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and magical darkness, with a passive perception of 22.
skills: Well-rounded in athletics, insight, perception, and religion, displaying a balance of physical and mental skill.
additional_information: Can heal allies significantly with its Heal ability.
Immunities to necrotic and poison damage.
Ability to consume life energy for temporary hit points.
Uses protective parry to defend allies from melee attacks.
Can cast control weather and raise dead without material components.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting provides access to commune and control weather, and can raise dead once per day.
test_queries: powerful celestial with a flaming sword
fallen celestial who can heal and attack
